name: Live or Die
summary:
Live or Die is the new free online multiplayer Battle Royale in which you can face other players in action-packed matches in which in addition to the other players you will find a wide cast of hostile, bloodthirsty and unfriendly creatures. Live or Die lets you choose up to seven different characters and customize them to your liking.

You will be able to travel to three worlds with totally different themes such as the Prehistoric World, the Fantastic World or the Strange World and you will be able to play in three game modes, each more exciting: Hunting Mode, which you can play alone or in cooperative mode with your friends, Battle Royale Mode, in which you can show who is the best and Survival Mode, where the rules of the game are totally different from the other two modes.
